Text: storage[+1]  It's nice that the Zen Micro has bells and whistles like FM (but where's AM???) and voice recording, and 20% more storage than "the other" mini MP3 player, but why is it so (...)ugly?  touchpad[-2] ##The colors are a joke, and I personally hate the stupid vertical touchpad.  design[-3]  But my biggest gripe is still the extremely ugly design.  player[-3][u] ##What's the point of having "good audio" in your hand when your g/f thinks you have no taste whatsoever and your friends laugh their heads off while proudly showing off their iPod Mini?  Creative should hire some real industrial designers.
